documentation.description: Inspector agents report on the status of a single entity at a point in time. They provide snapshot views by gathering information from state, logs, and artifacts.
when_to_use: Reporting status of a single workflow, service, or entity
Providing a snapshot view of current state

critical_rules.title: Single Entity Focus
critical_rules.description: Report on ONE entity at a time. Leave cross-entity views to Auditors.

critical_rules.title: Point-in-Time Snapshot
critical_rules.description: Report CURRENT state. Note the timestamp of the snapshot.

critical_rules.title: Comprehensive Sources
critical_rules.description: Gather from state files, logs, and artifacts.

critical_rules.title: Clear Status Indicators
critical_rules.description: Use consistent status values with visual indicators.

critical_rules.title: Actionable Information
critical_rules.description: Include next steps and commands to continue.

critical_rules.title: Non-Modifying
critical_rules.description: ONLY read, never modify. No side effects.
